description:
Title Core Component contains basic information about an Article Page: Section, District, Title, Author and Publish Date, this component is responsive to screen sizes and support style variations.
 Note: This component uses cmp-articlesection inside its structure

props.description: Base class to define a Title
Here is located the 'cmp-articlesection' element where the Section and District will be displayed
Class applied when the Title works as a Link
Container for the Article Section Information
Separator between the Section and District
